b'@DrKateLevinson yes...that is true. But its amazing once we realize that another work for uncertainty is reality.'
b'We can go back to our families. Our work. Our art. And leave our investments alone. Ah...the peace of ignoring the guesser with no clothing.'
b'then we realize that if we just ignore it life is much better.'
b'Yes, the guru is nothing more than a guesser pretending to be a forecaster. Then we realize that its all a hoax.'
b'With sadness we realize that just like a broken clock tells the correct time 2x a day, the guru is nothing more than a guesser.'
b'as often as he has been right.'
b'Then we look and realize that last time we listened the guru was wrong. In fact as we look into it, we see that the guru has been wrong...'
b'We all run as if we find the secret to endless youth and spread the word abroad. The guru has spoken...'
b'Then they pretend to know what will happen not only next year, but after lunch today as well.'
b'and we say to all of them...please tell us what will happen. They look down at us and say...oh my young ones...let me tell you what I see.'
b'We look for the people that have the title of Chief Economist, or Chief Investment Officer...and a big office...marble...big conference room'
b'We look to people pretending to be all that on TV. Wearing the right costumes. Pretending to know what will happen..'
b'We look for someone smart. Someone that went to the best school. Someone with the biggest computer/research staff/global locations...'
b'Will look for the village elder who can take the uncertainty out of the scary future. We look for someone the tribe trusts to tell us.'
b'Fast forward to the current version of crops and harvest (the market) and we still look for the wise one, the guru to tell us what will come'

b'Will the harvest work out? 

Should I plant corn or beans? 

Are the great rains going to come?

Please oh wise one tell me...'
b'As humans, we really, really, really want someone to tell us what is going to happen in the future. \n\nWhere will the buffalo be next year?'
b"Why would you do something that have clearly been shown to COST you money? Timing the market does NOT work...so don't do it."

b"Any real advisor knew a scary market would come. 

Didn't know when. 

Didn't know why.

But knew it was going to happen."
